content: this triangle shawl measures 44 wide at the top and 24 at the center point making it a versatile addition to any wardrobe the pattern includes written instructions and video tutorials for extra guidance this shawl is both lightweight and colorful adding a touch of whimsy to any outfit **unique features-** intermediate level pattern for a challenging yet rewarding project triangle shape adds elegance and versatility to your wardrobe written instructions and video tutorials for easy understanding **materials needed-** hook 3 75mm - furls https //tidd ly/4l6y8yy yarn red heart it s a wrap sprinkles https //amzn to/3jrejil light fingering weight 615 yards
